title: A Chinese Ghost Story Trilogy (1987-1991)
description:
Genre     :     Action | Comedy | Fantasy

A CHINESE GHOST STORY

Director  :     Siu-Tung Ching 
Writers   :     Songling Pu (novel), Gai Chi Yuen 
Stars     :     Leslie Cheung, Joey Wang, Ma Wu

A CHINESE GHOST STORY II

Director  :     Siu-Tung Ching 
Writers   :     Kan Keito, Kee-To Lam (screenplay)
Stars     :     Leslie Cheung, Joey Wang, Michelle Reis

A CHINESE GHOST STORY III

Directors :     Siu-Tung Ching, Hark Tsui (uncredited)
Writers   :     Roy Szeto, Hark Tsui 
Stars     :     Jacky Cheung, Yiu-Sing Cheung, Shun Lau
